tool_description: Seeking Alpha is the world’s largest investing community. Seeking Alpha’s content has unparalleled breadth and depth: from stocks, ETFs and mutual funds to commodities and cryptocurrency.   **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters
name: Seeking Alpha Finance
title: Seeking Alpha Finance

api_list.name: Symbols Brief metrics
api_list.description: Get metrics by Symbol slugs. Separate multiple slugs with a comma

api_list.name: Symbols Shares
api_list.description: Get shares for symbol

api_list.name: Symbols Dividend history
api_list.description: Get the dividend history for the symbol

api_list.name: Symbols Estimated estimates
api_list.description: Get the estimates for the symbol (Latest Quarter's Earnings, Upcoming Quarter's Earnings). Ex result: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/income-statement

api_list.name: Symbols Ratings
api_list.description: Get symbols ratings for periods. Ratings: authors, quant, sell side. Ex result: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/valuation/metrics

api_list.name: Symbols Press releases
api_list.description: Get a list of press releases for symbol. Ex result: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/press-releases

api_list.name: Symbols Option result
api_list.description: Get option result for the symbol. Ex.: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/options

api_list.name: Symbols Splits
api_list.description: Get splits for historical prices. Ex.: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/historical-price-quotes

api_list.name: Symbols Brief earnings
api_list.description: Get earnings by Symbol slugs. Separate multiple slugs with a comma

api_list.name: News List
api_list.description: Get list of the news by category. Trending news in the /news/trending. Ex.: https://seekingalpha.com/market-news/crypto

optional_parameters.name: date_end
optional_parameters.description: End date, filter data by date range

optional_parameters.name: date_start
optional_parameters.description: Start date, filter data by date range

api_list.name: Article Comment maps
api_list.description: Get comment maps by article id

api_list.name: Symbols Faq
api_list.description: Get Answers to common questions on a topic by Ticker slug. Ex.: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA

api_list.name: Stocks Tickers
api_list.description: Get stocks (tickers) from the screener. Ex. https://seekingalpha.com/screeners/96793299-Top-Rated-Stocks

required_parameters.name: screener_id
required_parameters.description: Screener ID, from `Screeners list` and `Screeners filters`

api_list.name: Symbols Attributes
api_list.description: Get details by Ticker Slugs. Specify attribute category

api_list.name: Symbols Sector metrics
api_list.description: Get the sector metrics for the symbol (Revisions Grade)

api_list.name: Symbols Metric grades
api_list.description: Get the ticker metric for the symbol

api_list.name: Article List
api_list.description: Get list of the article

optional_parameters.name: date_start
optional_parameters.description: Start date, filter data by date range

optional_parameters.name: date_end
optional_parameters.description: End date, filter data by date range

api_list.name: Symbols Data
api_list.description: Get symbol data by Ticker slug, (name, companyName, company, exchange, currency). Ex.: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA

api_list.name: Symbols Dividends Payout ratio
api_list.description: Get dividends payout ratio chart by Ticker slug

api_list.name: Symbols Ticker data
api_list.description: Get symbol ticker data by Ticker slug, (name, companyName, company, exchange, currency). Ex.: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA

api_list.name: Symbols Dividends estimates
api_list.description: Get dividends estimates data by Ticker slug

api_list.name: Symbols News
api_list.description: Get a list of news for symbol. Ex result: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/news

api_list.name: Symbols Analysis
api_list.description: Get a list of analysis for symbol. Ex result: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/analysis

api_list.name: Symbols Sec Filings
api_list.description: Get a list of sec filings for symbol. Ex result: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/sec-filings

api_list.name: Symbols Ratings histories
api_list.description: Get symbols histories. Ex result: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/valuation/metrics

api_list.name: Symbols Peers
api_list.description: Get peers for the symbol. Ex.: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/peers/related-stocks

api_list.name: Symbols Related analysis
api_list.description: Get a list of related analysis for symbol. Ex result: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/related-analysis

api_list.name: Symbols Metrics
api_list.description: Get metrics by Ticker slug. This is the most extensive point, use different groups to get attributes

api_list.name: Symbols Historical prices
api_list.description: Get historical prices by date and Ticker slug. Ex result: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/valuation/metrics

api_list.name: Symbols Option expirations
api_list.description: Get option expirations for the symbol. Ex.: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/options

api_list.name: Symbols Author ratings
api_list.description: Get a author ratings for symbol. Ex result: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/ratings/author-ratings

api_list.name: Meta Tooltips
api_list.description: Get tooltips by Ticker slug. Getting a description of the data, for each category. Use to get additional data and information.

api_list.name: Symbols Ratings relative
api_list.description: Get relative ratings by Ticker slug

api_list.name: Search Advanced
api_list.description: Get all search result (people,symbols,pages) by query. Advanced search

api_list.name: Symbols Suggested
api_list.description: Get suggested tickers by symbol

api_list.name: Symbols Transcripts
api_list.description: Get a list of transcripts for symbol. Ex result: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/earnings/transcripts

api_list.name: Feeds Earnings articles
api_list.description: Get list of post earnings articles

required_parameters.name: date_end
required_parameters.description: End date, filter data by date range

required_parameters.name: date_start
required_parameters.description: Start date, filter data by date range

api_list.name: Symbols Estimated earning announces
api_list.description: Get estimated earning announces for symbol. Ex result: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/earnings

api_list.name: Article Trending
api_list.description: Get list of the trending article

api_list.name: Screeners Details
api_list.description: Get more details about screener. Ex. https://seekingalpha.com/screeners/96793299-Top-Rated-Stocks

required_parameters.name: screener_id
required_parameters.description: Screener ID, from `Screeners list` and `Screeners filters`

api_list.name: Press releases Comment maps
api_list.description: Get press-releases comment maps by Press releases ID. Ex: https://seekingalpha.com/pr/18970018-nvidia-las-vegas-sands-fall-merck-boeing-rise

api_list.name: Symbols Charts metrics
api_list.description: Get charts (metrics) by ticker_slug and period

api_list.name: Article Details
api_list.description: Get all details of the article by article id

api_list.name: News Comments
api_list.description: Get news comments by news_id. Check `News comment-maps`

required_parameters.name: news_id
required_parameters.description: News ID, from `News trending` or `News list`

api_list.name: Authors Ticker counts
api_list.description: Get ticker counts of author by slug

api_list.name: Screeners Filters
api_list.description: Get list of screener filters

api_list.name: News Data
api_list.description: Get news data by news_id. Author and news content. Ex.: https://seekingalpha.com/news/3893978-canaan-launches-new-generation-bitcoin-mining-machine

required_parameters.name: news_id
required_parameters.description: News ID, from `News trending` or `News list`

api_list.name: Feeds Earnings market current
api_list.description: Get list of post earnings market current

required_parameters.name: date_start
required_parameters.description: Start date, filter data by date range

required_parameters.name: date_end
required_parameters.description: End date, filter data by date range

api_list.name: Meta Tooltips by slug
api_list.description: Get tooltips for news or article

api_list.name: News Suggestion
api_list.description: Get news suggestion

required_parameters.name: news_id
required_parameters.description: News ID, from `News trending` or `News list`

api_list.name: Symbols Fundamentals
api_list.description: Get fundamentals data by ticker_slug

api_list.name: Symbols Earning summaries
api_list.description: Get a earning summaries by symbol

api_list.name: Symbols Financials metrics
api_list.description: Get financials (income-statement, balance-sheet, cash-flow-statement) for symbol. Ex result: https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/NVDA/income-statement

api_list.name: News Trending
api_list.description: Get the list of trending news by category

api_list.name: Markets Dividend tr stocks
api_list.description: Get a list of trending dividend stocks
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://seeking-alpha-finance.p.rapidapi.com/v1/markets/dividend-investing"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "seeking-alpha-finance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Authors Details
api_list.description: Get all details of author by the author slug

api_list.name: Press releases Data
api_list.description: Get press releases data by Press releases ID. Use `Symbols Press releases` endpoint. Ex: https://seekingalpha.com/pr/18970018-nvidia-las-vegas-sands-fall-merck-boeing-rise

api_list.name: Instablogs Comment maps
api_list.description: Get instablogs comments map by instablog_post_id

api_list.name: Filings Comment maps
api_list.description: Get filing comment maps by Filing ID. Use `Symbols Sec Filings` endpoint. Ex: https://seekingalpha.com/filing/6823254

api_list.name: Symbols Quotes
api_list.description: Get real time quotes by Symbol IDs. For ex: Nasdaq,DowJones (590019,598187). BTC-USD (581328). Separate multiple IDs with a comma. ![Screen](https://i.imgur.com/RPLPfUU.png)

api_list.name: Filings Data
api_list.description: Get filing data by Filing ID. Use `Symbols Sec Filings` endpoint. Ex: https://seekingalpha.com/filing/6823254

api_list.name: User Discussions
api_list.description: Get discussions posts of user by user_id
